multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: commodities; Nigeria's revised GDP may lift oil demand expectations, supporting WTI prices.

category.motivation: The article discusses a major GDP revision in Nigeria, which qualifies as a macroeconomic event.

impact.motivation: The article reports a significant revision of Nigeria’s GDP, directly affecting the node’s value and interpretation.

time_frame.motivation: The article highlights recent data corrections and announcements (within weeks and a month), focusing on immediate events affecting economic figures.

article_node.title: How Nigeria’s Do-It-Yourself Economy Got a Lot Bigger
article_node.summary:
Assembling economic data is a continuous process, dependent on information that’s sometimes incomplete or late in arriving, which can lead to dramatic corrections as happened in the US a few weeks ago. Another such shift happened in Nigeria last month when it was announced that the nation’s gross domestic product was suddenly more than 30% bigger.

Gathering figures for an emerging or frontier market isn’t straightforward — particularly given how much activity occurs outside the formal part of t...
